Patient Profile Image: Personal Medical History: What day did the patients last menstrual cycle begin? What birth defect(s) was the mother born with? Is this the patients first pregnancy? Other Personal Medical History Questions: Lifestyle Questions: Has the patient consumed alcohol during the pregnancy? Does the patient smoke tobacco or use nicotine-containing products?
